# Draft:Abeer Mohamed Anwar

Abir Mohamed Anwar is an Egyptian children's writer and an Assistant Professor of Cognitive Psychology at the Faculty of Arts, Cairo University. She has published several stories and has won various literary awards in the field of children's literature.[https://cu.edu.eg/ar/Cairo-University-Faculty-News-6559.html Cairo University - Congratulations to Dr. Abir Mohamed Anwar]
Biography
Abir Mohamed Anwar graduated from the Faculty of Arts at Cairo University with a Bachelor's degree in 1986. She then obtained a Diploma in Applied Psychology in 1987, followed by a Master's degree in Psychology in 1994, and a PhD in Psychology in 2002.[https://www.amazon.com/توتة-Arabic-Title-Hindi-عبير/dp/9771457977 Tooteh (Arabic Title) (Hindi Edition): Abir Mohamed Anwar: 9789771457978: Amazon.com: Books]  She currently works as an Assistant Professor of Cognitive Psychology at the same faculty.
Awards
* 2006-07: Suzan Mubarak Award for Children's Literature.
* 2008-2010-2014: Shield of the Faculty of Arts, Cairo University.
* 2008: Shoman Award for Children's Literature for her book "Bustan al-Ghadab".[http://qallib.noursoft.com/records/index/1/25144 Libsys Opac]
* 2014: Arab Forum Award for Children's Books for Best Children's Book for her story "Tasamoh Shajarah Saghira".[https://www.uae71.com/posts/1392 Honoring the winners of the Arab Forum Award for Children's Books] [http://wam.ae/ar/details/1395242816640 Emirates News Agency - Honoring the winners of the Arab Forum Award for Children's Books]
* 2015: Sharjah International Children's Book Festival Award for Best Book for Children with Disabilities.
* 2020: Children's Award at the Cairo International Book Fair for her story "Secret Letters".[https://al-ain.com/article/winners-cairo-international-book-fair-2020 Cairo International Book Fair announces the winners of 2020 awards] [https://m.akhbarelyom.com/news/newdetails/2987088/1/We-publish-the-names-of-the-books-winning-the-Book-Fair-Award We publish the names of the books winning the Book Fair Award | Akhbarelyom Electronic Portal]
* 2021: Chosen by Dar Nahda Al-Masriah for Printing, Publishing and Distribution for her story "Thawb al-Eid" as one of the best global publications within the International Reading Club of the United Nations.[https://www.elwatannews.com/news/details/5458699 Nahda Egypt tops the International Reading Club list of the United Nations with a children's story - Egypt - Al-Watan] [https://www.khabrna.com/29630/تصدُر-دار-نهضة-مصر-قائمة-نادي-القراءة/ Nahda Egypt tops the International Reading Club list | Khabrna]
